channel.title: Have a few easy questions - it's been a while for me
channel.description:
I just have a few easy questions to ask, it's been a while since I've did anything with RSPS'.
1. How do I add items to shops? 2. How can I find the item id's? I remember there is a list somewhere, I think it's in the client? 3. How do I change the background of a client? Right now, I have the old RS GFX, with the animated lamps.
That's all I can think of right now, I'll post later if I have other questions.
Thanks!

item.title: Have a few easy questions - it's been a while for me
item.dc:creator: @FreePkServer FreePkServer
item.description:
@FreePkServer wrote:

Last time i checked exion was PI
if that is the case, go into data, config, then shops.cfg
then in their you should see something like this

Now, the first 2 numbers 2 2 dont need to be worried about, 19736 is the item code, 1 is the ammount in that shop, then so on, to add more just click tab add a item code, tab again and the ammount etc

Item ID’s i use www.itemdb.biz and the background should be in your client under sprites, you should be able to find it without much troubles just thumbnail all your pictures and look for your background n_n hope that helps

Edit: check your item.cfg incase yur server has server specific item numbers, its best to do that for item codes

Read full topic
